mapper.insert: insert into content (title, text, date_created,user_id) values (#{title}, #{text}, #{dateCreated},#{userId}) -- all fields : content_id, title, text, date_created, view_count, like_count, unlike_count

insert into comment (comment_id, content_id, text, date_created, username) values (#{commentId}, #{contentId}, #{text},#{dateCreated},#{username}) -- all fields : content_id, title, text, date_created, view_count, like_count, unlike_count
